nodes.text: The Great Crystal of Aantonaii was an artifact of grave importance to the Sith.

A massive, pulsating red crystal, the Great Crystal of Aantonaii was recovered by Darth Sidious sometime during his life and would come to be kept in the Chancellor Palpatine Surgical Reconstruction Center until the end of the Clone Wars. Preserved within the facility's central chamber, the crystal was kept hidden from all of the medcenter's staff.
